GC_Award_N_11.name: Adept Hunter Certificate
GC_Award_N_11.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing many high rank quests.

GC_Award_N_03.name: Ancestral Blade
GC_Award_N_03.description: A prize for vanquishing Magnamalo. This blade has led Kamura for generations.

GC_Award_N_MR_46.name: Anomaly Hunt Silver Trophy
GC_Award_N_MR_46.description: Awarded for slaying your first afflicted monster.

GC_Award_N_MR_14.name: Anomaly Research Report
GC_Award_N_MR_14.description: An extremely detailed report, the result of impressive hard work researching the Anomaly.

GC_Award_N_26.name: Antique Bookmark
GC_Award_N_26.description: Awarded for finding many Old Messages. Adorned with a tasteful pattern.

GC_Award_N_04.name: Apex Shortsword
GC_Award_N_04.description: Granted for banishing an Apex in the Rampage. Its blade is riddled with battle scars.

GC_Award_N_13.name: Arena Fighter Certificate
GC_Award_N_13.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing many Arena quests.

GC_Award_N_10.name: Aspiring Hunter Certificate
GC_Award_N_10.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing many low rank quests.

GC_Award_N_MR_04.name: Azure Feather Fountain Pen
GC_Award_N_MR_04.description: A fountain pen with a blue feather gifted by Fiorayne. Awarded for hunting the Lunagaron.

GC_Award_N_01.name: Badge of Excellence
GC_Award_N_01.description: The mark of a peerless hunter, conferred only to those who have earned a lot of awards.

GC_Award_N_MR_16.name: Bahari's Hand-Wound Birdie
GC_Award_N_MR_16.description: Bahari's handmade toy that walks when wound up. Proves you frequent the Anomaly Lab.

GC_Award_N_22.name: Beat-up Construction Kit
GC_Award_N_22.description: Awarded for unlocking lots of camps. Each of its nicks and grooves tells a story.

GC_Award_N_MR_19.name: Beloved Bouquet
GC_Award_N_MR_19.description: Awarded for fulfilling various requests in Kamura and/or Elgado.

GC_Award_N_MR_34.name: Buddy Whistle
GC_Award_N_MR_34.description: A simple flute with far-reaching tones. Awarded to those who have found a lot of Recon destinations.

GC_Award_N_06.name: Calamity Conqueror Scroll
GC_Award_N_06.description: Received upon defeating Ibushi and Narwa. Depicts the two serpents leading the Rampage.

GC_Award_N_42.name: Chef's Trusty Tools
GC_Award_N_42.description: Awarded for helping Yomogi. You can almost hear the Tea Dealers' chanting when looking at it.

GC_Award_N_44.name: Cohoots' Dresser
GC_Award_N_44.description: Awarded to connoisseurs of Cohoot outfits. Perfect for storing your avian apparel.

GC_Award_N_39.name: Colorful Armor Stand
GC_Award_N_39.description: Awarded for forging many a layered armor. Its variegated hues are simply captivating.

GC_Award_N_MR_40.name: Comfortable Sandals
GC_Award_N_MR_40.description: Sandals for exploring. Awarded for talking with lots of people in the Outpost.

GC_Award_N_MR_17.name: Copal Brooch
GC_Award_N_MR_17.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Citadel. A charm praying for your good health.

GC_Award_N_29.name: Copper Ecologist's Award
GC_Award_N_29.description: Awarded for photographing many Hunting Helpers. Proof you've expanded your hunter horizons.

GC_Award_N_MR_12.name: Cups of Friendship
GC_Award_N_MR_12.description: Awarded for deepening bonds with many Followers. Sharing this cup fosters friendship.

GC_Award_N_27.name: Deft-hand Rod
GC_Award_N_27.description: Awarded for catching many fish. Feels familiar in your hands. One cast, one catch!

GC_Award_N_32.name: Extravagant Cashbox
GC_Award_N_32.description: Awarded for earning 1,000,000 zenny. Heavy with impressively intricate goldwork.

GC_Award_N_MR_20.name: Familiar Construction Kit
GC_Award_N_MR_20.description: An easy-to-deploy camping kit. Awarded for unlocking a lot of camps in the Jungle and Citadel.

GC_Award_N_08.name: Fan of Ascendancy
GC_Award_N_08.description: The mark of a hunter who has attempted some of the toughest quests around—and won.

GC_Award_N_07.name: Fan of Fading Crimson
GC_Award_N_07.description: A decorative fan awarded to those who vanquished the crimson-glowing threat to the village.

GC_Award_N_09.name: Fan of True Ascendancy
GC_Award_N_09.description: Mark of a hunter who has bested Infernal Springs' most arduous challenges.

GC_Award_N_47.name: Five-in-One Plaque
GC_Award_N_47.description: Awarded for hunting 5 monsters in 1 Expedition Tour.

GC_Award_N_MR_35.name: Flaky Canyne Pie
GC_Award_N_MR_35.description: A tasty treat for hard-working Canynes. Awarded for teaching your Canyne lots of techniques.

GC_Award_N_36.name: From Palicoes, with Love
GC_Award_N_36.description: Awarded for raising various support-type Palicoes to their maximum levels.

GC_Award_N_15.name: Frozen Lampsquid Earring
GC_Award_N_15.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Frost Islands. A relic encased in primeval ice.

GC_Award_N_50.name: Gold Crown Plaque
GC_Award_N_50.description: Awarded for registering many gold crown-sized monsters.

GC_Award_N_MR_45.name: Gold Crown Shield
GC_Award_N_MR_45.description: Awarded for registering almost all gold crown-sized monsters.

GC_Award_N_31.name: Gold Ecologist's Award
GC_Award_N_31.description: Awarded for photographing many Endemic Lifeforms. Now you're a Guild-recognized researcher!

GC_Award_N_25.name: Golden Spiribug Plate
GC_Award_N_25.description: Awarded for gathering 1000 Golden and Gilded Spiribugs. Shines much like they do.

GC_Award_N_35.name: Good Luck Charm
GC_Award_N_35.description: Proof of having sent the Meowcenaries out on a quest 100 times.

GC_Award_N_MR_26.name: Gorgeous Helm
GC_Award_N_MR_26.description: A helm with golden hollows and blue wings. Awarded for forging even more valuable layered armor.

GC_Award_N_MR_25.name: Great Helmet
GC_Award_N_MR_25.description: A pretty great winged helmet. Awarded for forging even more valuable weapons and armor.

GC_Award_N_MR_21.name: Great Wirebug Medal
GC_Award_N_MR_21.description: Awarded for discovering a lot of Great Wirebug launch points in the Jungle and the Citadel.

GC_Award_N_23.name: Great Wirebug Plate
GC_Award_N_23.description: Awarded for discovering many Great Wirebug launch points. Sports a nice relevant design.

GC_Award_N_18.name: Heliotrope Bracelet
GC_Award_N_18.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Lava Caverns. Glitters a red-blue mélange.

GC_Award_N_MR_50.name: Hero's Accolade
GC_Award_N_MR_50.description: The mark of a great hero, who has acquired a large number of awards.

GC_Award_N_MR_41.name: Hunter's Bronze Shield
GC_Award_N_MR_41.description: Awarded for hunting 100 large master rank monsters.

GC_Award_N_MR_43.name: Hunter's Gold Shield
GC_Award_N_MR_43.description: Awarded for hunting 1000 large master rank monsters.

GC_Award_N_MR_42.name: Hunter's Silver Shield
GC_Award_N_MR_42.description: Awarded for hunting 500 large master rank monsters.

GC_Award_N_24.name: Hunting Helpers Plate
GC_Award_N_24.description: Awarded for gathering 500 Hunting Helpers. Features a beautiful depiction of them.

GC_Award_N_MR_22.name: Immaculate Bookmark
GC_Award_N_MR_22.description: Awarded for discovering a lot of Old Messages in the Jungle and Citadel. An unspoiled antique.

GC_Award_N_MR_38.name: Jewelgrass Planter
GC_Award_N_MR_38.description: Awarded to those who rode various monsters with the power of Morphed Wirebugs.

GC_Award_N_02.name: Kamura Amulet
GC_Award_N_02.description: A trinket given to new hunters who have proved themselves capable.

GC_Award_N_20.name: Kamura Pinwheel
GC_Award_N_20.description: Awarded for performing 1000 Wiredashes. Spins smoothly in the wind.

GC_Award_N_MR_02.name: Long-Distance Binoculars
GC_Award_N_MR_02.description: Binoculars giving a clear view of far-off targets. Awarded to staunch investigators.

GC_Award_N_38.name: Luxury Armor Stand
GC_Award_N_38.description: Awarded for forging many valuable weapons and armor. Made from premium materials.

GC_Award_N_MR_30.name: Maestro's Trusty Tools
GC_Award_N_MR_30.description: Super popular in the Tea Shop! Awarded for helping make new dango, even in far-off Elgado.

GC_Award_N_MR_05.name: Majestic Desk Banner
GC_Award_N_MR_05.description: A desk flag proving the owner's distinguished service. Awarded for slaying Malzeno.

GC_Award_N_41.name: Master's Black Belt
GC_Award_N_41.description: Awarded for obtaining many Switch Skills, a feat of both mental and bodily discipline.

GC_Award_N_49.name: Mini Crown Plaque
GC_Award_N_49.description: Awarded for registering many miniature crownsized monsters.

GC_Award_N_MR_44.name: Miniature Crown Shield
GC_Award_N_MR_44.description: Awarded for registering almost all miniature crown-sized monsters.

GC_Award_N_MR_32.name: Napping Felyne & Canyne
GC_Award_N_MR_32.description: Toys of a cuddling Felyne and Canyne. Awarded to avid instructors at the Buddy Dojo.

GC_Award_N_MR_23.name: Natural Picture Frame
GC_Award_N_MR_23.description: A smart frame awarded for photographing many creatures in the Citadel and Jungle.

GC_Award_N_MR_13.name: Painting - Crimson Nightmare
GC_Award_N_MR_13.description: A depiction of the dreadful Qurio. Awarded for completing numerous Anomaly Quests.

GC_Award_N_MR_10.name: Painting - Foreign Threads
GC_Award_N_MR_10.description: Awarded for completing many Follower Quests to mark deep village-Outpost ties.

GC_Award_N_MR_11.name: Painting - Seicho's Place
GC_Award_N_MR_11.description: Proof of having completed many Support Surveys. Soar away into a clear blue sky.

GC_Award_N_37.name: Palamute Gear Tune-up Kit
GC_Award_N_37.description: Awarded for collecting a lot of Palamute Gear. Daily maintenance is what will make it last!

GC_Award_N_40.name: Petalace Arrangement Vase
GC_Award_N_40.description: Awarded for obtaining many Petalaces. It fills rooms with a delightful floral aroma.

GC_Award_N_MR_36.name: Polychrome Acorn
GC_Award_N_MR_36.description: A cute and colorful painted acorn. Awarded for having lots of Buddies with outstanding Skill Memory.

GC_Award_N_16.name: Prismatic Chalice
GC_Award_N_16.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Flooded Forest. Was found buried under rubble.

GC_Award_N_12.name: Rampage Nemesis Certificate
GC_Award_N_12.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing many Rampage quests.

GC_Award_N_MR_09.name: Record of Utmost Valor - Arena
GC_Award_N_MR_09.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing even more Arena quests.

GC_Award_N_MR_07.name: Record of Utmost Valor - Master
GC_Award_N_MR_07.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing many Master Rank quests.

GC_Award_N_MR_06.name: Royal Declaration of Gratitude
GC_Award_N_MR_06.description: An official thank-you letter. For hunters who contributed greatly to the Kingdom's peace.

GC_Award_N_MR_01.name: Royal Request for Cooperation
GC_Award_N_MR_01.description: An official request for Kamura's hunter. Awarded for collaboration with Elgado Outpost.

GC_Award_N_45.name: Runner's Sandals
GC_Award_N_45.description: Awarded for talking to many of Kamura's citizens. Feels like walking on a carpet of cloud.

GC_Award_N_MR_18.name: Sea-Blue Amulet
GC_Award_N_MR_18.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Jungle. A talisman to protect you on your travels.

GC_Award_N_48.name: Seasoned Jockey Plaque
GC_Award_N_48.description: Awarded for riding many different monsters.

GC_Award_N_MR_31.name: Secret Honey Jar
GC_Award_N_MR_31.description: Awarded to dango connoisseurs for using many Hopping Skewers. Add honey to sweeten things up!

GC_Award_N_21.name: Shabby Canyne Saddle
GC_Award_N_21.description: Awarded for riding Canynes many times. Worn in odd places from use on countless voyages.

GC_Award_N_17.name: Silver Cactus Ring
GC_Award_N_17.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Sandy Plains. A peculiar silver cactus ring.

GC_Award_N_30.name: Silver Ecologist's Award
GC_Award_N_30.description: Awarded by one enthusiastic researcher for photographing many Rare Creature.

GC_Award_N_MR_27.name: Smithy's Custom-made Gloves
GC_Award_N_MR_27.description: Awarded for Augmenting many weapons via Qurious Crafting. Specially developed to handle dangerous afflicted materials.

GC_Award_N_MR_28.name: Smithy's Tools of the Trade
GC_Award_N_MR_28.description: Awarded for Augmenting a lot of armor via Qurious Crafting. These tools can work even the most brittle of materials.

GC_Award_N_MR_08.name: Snowy Cohoot Mini-Pouch
GC_Award_N_MR_08.description: Awarded for befriending a fledgling Snowy Cohoot from Elgado. Looks tiny, but has a big appetite.

GC_Award_N_MR_33.name: Sojourn Necklace
GC_Award_N_MR_33.description: A necklace that ended up with your Buddy. Awarded for trading with Letters of Introduction.

GC_Award_N_MR_29.name: Solid Padlock
GC_Award_N_MR_29.description: Awarded for collecting even more trinkets and wall hangings. Won't budge, no matter what.

GC_Award_N_14.name: Spiritwood Necklace
GC_Award_N_14.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Shrine Ruins. Made from Spiritwood branches.

GC_Award_N_43.name: Sturdy Padlock
GC_Award_N_43.description: Awarded for collecting many decorations and hanging scrolls. Remember to lock up!

GC_Award_N_MR_48.name: Surmounter’s Slaying Shield
GC_Award_N_MR_48.description: Awarded for slaying your first Risen monster.

GC_Award_N_MR_03.name: Survey Cape
GC_Award_N_MR_03.description: Protects the wearer from the harshest environments. Awarded for hunting the Garangolm.

GC_Award_N_05.name: Tempestuous Triumph Scroll
GC_Award_N_05.description: A hanging scroll from Master Hojo, depicting your victory over Wind Serpent Ibushi.

GC_Award_N_34.name: Thank-mew Letter
GC_Award_N_34.description: Awarded for hiring 50 Buddies. We a-purr-eciate your fur-iendly patronage!

GC_Award_N_MR_24.name: Transcender's Red Sash
GC_Award_N_MR_24.description: Its refinement exceeds human capability. Awarded for obtaining even more Switch Skills.

GC_Award_N_MR_39.name: Unbreakable Bag
GC_Award_N_MR_39.description: Wow! A whole bag awarded for obtaining samples of items from all over the place.

GC_Award_N_MR_15.name: Vermilion Amber Essence
GC_Award_N_MR_15.description: Awarded only to those who have completed tasks designated by the Research Lab to be the most difficult.

GC_Award_N_28.name: Well-done Grillmeister
GC_Award_N_28.description: Awarded for cooking a welldone steak 30 times. Good job, and well done!

GC_Award_N_33.name: Well-worn Cashbox
GC_Award_N_33.description: Awarded for accumulating 100,000 Kamura Points. Gleams with polish despite great use.

GC_Award_N_MR_37.name: Windbreaker Scarf
GC_Award_N_MR_37.description: Ignore wind as you whip through the world. Awarded for performing many Switch Skill Swaps.

GC_Award_N_19.name: Wreath of Honor
GC_Award_N_19.description: A wreath received from the villagers as thanks for taking on their many requests.
